duties_responsibilities.duty: Review loan files and determine required documentation to meet investor guidelines.
Communicate and respond to internal and external customers within 2 hours.
Utilize pipeline reports to effectively manage loans and prioritize daily workflow.
Become proficient with document management system and update all information appropriately and accurately.
Consult with Loan Processing Manager weekly on loan status and prioritize workflow.
Maintain current knowledge of guidelines and loan programs.
Request, organize, and process loan documentation and submit files to Underwriting monthly.
Successfully manage a full pipeline, month over month.
Consistently hit monthly funding requirements based on pipeline size and market conditions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required
